description: Identifier of the application user who owns this inbox entry.
System-assigned unique identifier for the message within the inbox.
Short title or subject line provided by the sender.
Full text content of the message.
Code indicating message status (likely Unread/Read/Archived/Deleted); confirm with SME.
Sender’s address or user identifier in the system.
Primary recipient’s address or user identifier.
Addresses or user IDs copied on the message, if any; may be delimited.
Addresses or user IDs blind-copied on the message, hidden from other recipients.
Priority level for the message (e.g., Low/Normal/High); confirm with SME.
User or process that created this record.
Timestamp when the record was created/received.
User or process that last modified this record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Reference to an associated work order in the fleet maintenance system.
Generic link to a related entity or module (likely asset, incident, ticket); confirm with SME.
Identifier of the originating message for replies/forwards, enabling conversation threading.
